verses.verse: And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was brought down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and Potiphar <S%H6318><s%>, an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%>, an Egyptian <S%H376><s%> <S%H4713><s%>, bought <S%H7069><s%> him of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Ishmeelites <S%H3459><s%>, which had brought him down <S%H3381><s%> thither.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and he was a prosperous <S%H6743><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; and he was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>.

And his master <S%H113><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with him, and that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made all that he did <S%H6213><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in his sight <S%H5869><s%>, and he served <S%H8334><s%> him: and he made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> over his house <S%H1004><s%>, and all that he had <S%H3426><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it came to pass from the time <S%H227><s%> that he had made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, and over all that he had <S%H3426><s%>, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Egyptian's <S%H4713><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> sake <S%H1558><s%>; and the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was upon all that he had <S%H3426><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>, and in the field <S%H7704><s%>.

And he left <S%H5800><s%> all that he had in Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>; and he knew <S%H3045><s%> not ought <S%H3972><s%> he had, save <S%H518><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> which he did eat <S%H398><s%>. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was a goodly <S%H8389><s%> person, and well <S%H3303><s%> favoured <S%H4758><s%>.

¶ And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that his master's <S%H113><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H5375><s%> her eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon Joseph <S%H3130><s%>; and she said <S%H559><s%>, Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me.

But he refused <S%H3985><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto his master's <S%H113><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, Behold, my master <S%H113><s%> wotteth <S%H3045><s%> not what is with me in the house <S%H1004><s%>, and he hath committed <S%H5414><s%> all that he hath <S%H3426><s%> to my hand <S%H3027><s%>;

There is none greater <S%H1419><s%> in this house <S%H1004><s%> than I; neither <S%H3808><s%> hath he kept back <S%H2820><s%> any thing <S%H3972><s%> from me but thee, because <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art his wife <S%H802><s%>: how then can I do <S%H6213><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, and sin <S%H2398><s%> against God <S%H430><s%>?

And it came to pass, as she spake <S%H1696><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%>, that he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto her, to lie <S%H7901><s%> by her <S%H681><s%>, or to be with her.

And it came to pass about this time <S%H3117><s%>, that Joseph went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> his business <S%H4399><s%>; and there was none of the men <S%H376><s%> <S%H582><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> there within.

And she caught <S%H8610><s%> him by his garment <S%H899><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me: and he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%>, and got <S%H3318><s%> him out <S%H2351><s%>.
And it came to pass, when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and was fled <S%H5127><s%> forth <S%H2351><s%>,

That she called <S%H7121><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%> of her house <S%H1004><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%> unto them, saying <S%H559><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, he hath brought in <S%H935><s%> an Hebrew <S%H376><s%> <S%H5680><s%> unto us to mock <S%H6711><s%> us; he came in <S%H935><s%> unto me to lie <S%H7901><s%> with me, and I cried <S%H7121><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>:

And it came to pass, when he heard <S%H8085><s%> that I lifted up <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%>, that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> with me <S%H681><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%>, and got him <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H2351><s%>.
And she laid up <S%H3240><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by her <S%H681><s%>, until his lord <S%H113><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%>.

And she spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him according to these words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%>, which thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> unto us, came in <S%H935><s%> unto me to mock <S%H6711><s%> me:

And it came to pass, as I lifted up <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%>, that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> with me <S%H681><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%> out <S%H2351><s%>.

And it came to pass, when his master <S%H113><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%>, which she spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him, saying <S%H559><s%>, After this manner <S%H1697><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> to me; that his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%>.

And Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> master <S%H113><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him, and put him <S%H5414><s%> into the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>, a place <S%H4725><s%> where the king's <S%H4428><s%> prisoners <S%H615><s%> were bound <S%H631><s%>: and he was there in the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>.

¶ But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and shewed <S%H5186><s%> him mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> him favour <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>.

And the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> committed <S%H5414><s%> to Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> all the prisoners <S%H615><s%> that were in the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>; and whatsoever they did <S%H6213><s%> there, he was the doer <S%H6213><s%> of it.

The keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> not to any thing <S%H3972><s%> that was under his hand <S%H3027><s%>; because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with him, and that which he did <S%H6213><s%>, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made it to prosper <S%H6743><s%>.
